MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH3 postcode area of Tattenhall and Milton Green, affecting properties in Whitchurch Road, Western Ave and surrounding streets. We are aware of the previous power interruption earlier this morning and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on their way to investigate. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.45am.  Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.26am on April 1, 2021.
